\documentclass[10pt]{article}
\RequirePackage[a4paper,top=2cm,left=1cm,right=1cm,bottom=2cm]{geometry}

\usepackage[scaled]{helvet}
\renewcommand\familydefault{\sfdefault}

\usepackage{pdfpages}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{xcolor}
% Import last to avoid problems
\usepackage{hyperref}

% Counter for page numbers
\newcounter{pageNumber}

\providecommand{\author}{}
\providecommand{\title}{}
\providecommand{\version}{}
\providecommand{\pdfDoc}{}
\providecommand{\numberingType}{roman}

% Remove header divider
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}

\fancypagestyle{roman}{
  \fancyfoot[CO]{\textcolor{black!50}{\roman{pageNumber}}}
}

\fancypagestyle{arabic}{
  \fancyhead[RO]{\textcolor{black!50}{\title}}

  \fancyfoot[LO]{\textcolor{black!50}{\author}}
  \fancyfoot[CO]{\textcolor{black!50}{\arabic{pageNumber}}}
  \fancyfoot[RO]{\textcolor{black!50}{v\version}}
}

\begin{document}
  \includepdf[pagecommand={\thispagestyle{\numberingType}\stepcounter{pageNumber}},pages=-]{\pdfDoc}
\end{document}
